name: Remote PC Controller
body:
With the Remote PC Controller, you can easily control someone's PC from your own if both of them are connected via LAN and the other user gives you permission to do so. The project is the result of an educational effort to make a replica of the popular software TeamViewer.

# How to use:
- Download the latest release from [remote-pc-controller/releases](https://github.com/AnindyaPaul/remote-pc-controller/releases).
- Run the jar file in both PC. You need JRE to run the application.
- Enter IP of the PC you want to control.
- Enter the password that is being shown in that PC.
- Click connect and wait for the other user to accept.
- Control using the control window.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
